content.text: Hi! I'm just getting over a breakup.
Hi! Sorry to hear that. What happened?
She left me for her boss.
That's tough. But you'll get through this.
Thanks. I'm trying to focus on my health and fitness.
That's a great idea! I love to eat healthy and exercise regularly.
Me too! I've been trying to eat more fruits and vegetables, and I've been working out in my home gym every day.
That's awesome! I'm not as good about working out, but I do love to cook healthy meals.
What kind of healthy meals do you like to cook?
I love to make salads, soups, and stir-fries. I also love to bake healthy desserts.
That sounds great! I love all of those things.
Well, if you ever want to come over for dinner, I'd be happy to cook for you.
That's so nice of you! I'd love that.
Great! I'll make you my famous lasagna.
That sounds delicious! I can't wait
